title: Content Amplifier Pipeline
description: Transform YouTube educational content into multi-platform learning materials: extract transcripts, generate visual summaries, create dev.to articles, and deploy a companion website.
example_prompt: Take this YouTube video about machine learning fundamentals and create a comprehensive learning package with article, visuals, and deployed website.
example_result:
Content transformation complete! Here's what I created:

1. Transcript Extraction (YouTube Transcript Extension):
   - Extracted full transcript from 45-minute ML fundamentals video
   - Identified key concepts and timestamps

2. Visual Summary Creation (Auto Visualiser Extension):
   - Generated 5 concept diagrams (neural networks, gradient descent, etc.)
   - Created learning progress chart
   - Saved visualizations to cloud

3. Article Generation (Dev.to Extension):
   - Published comprehensive article with code examples
   - Added generated visualizations inline
   - Article URL: dev.to/user/ml-fundamentals-explained

4. Website Deployment (Vercel Extension):
   - Created interactive learning site with transcript sections
   - Embedded visualizations and code playground
   - Live at: ml-fundamentals.vercel.app

Features:
✓ End-to-end content transformation
✓ Multi-format output (visual, written, interactive)
✓ Automated deployment
✓ Cross-platform distribution

Next steps:
1. Share on Reddit's r/learnmachinelearning?
2. Create PDF study guide?
3. Generate speech narration?

extensions.name: YouTube Transcript Extension
extensions.description: Extracts and processes YouTube video transcripts for analysis and transformation.

extensions.name: Auto Visualiser Extension
extensions.description: Automatically generates data visualizations and concept diagrams from text content.

extensions.name: Dev.to Extension
extensions.description: Creates and publishes technical articles on the Dev.to platform.

extensions.name: Vercel Extension
extensions.description: Deploys websites and web applications to Vercel's hosting platform.
